# Microsoft UI Automation

> Documentation for Microsoft UI Automation.

- [Access Embedded Objects Using UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/access-embedded-objects-using-ui-automation.md): See how to access embedded objects using UI Automation within text control content. Embedded objects are considered children of the UI Automation text provider.
- [Accessibility Best Practices](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/accessibility-best-practices.md): Learn about accessibility best practices in .NET. Explore programmatic access, user settings, visual UI design, navigation, and multimodal interfaces.
- [Add Content to a Text Box Using UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/add-content-to-a-text-box-using-ui-automation.md): See an example of how to add content into a single-line text box by using Microsoft UI Automation in .NET.
- [Caching in UI Automation Clients](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/caching-in-ui-automation-clients.md): Get details about caching in UI Automation clients in .NET. Caching is defined as the pre-fetching of data.
- [Client-Side UI Automation Provider Implementation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/client-side-ui-automation-provider-implementation.md): Understand client-side UI Automation provider implementation. Know how to distribute, register, and configure client-side providers.
- [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md): View a control pattern mapping table for UI Automation clients. Actions for certain control types may be supported, conditionally supported, or not supported.
- [Create a Client-Side UI Automation Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/create-a-client-side-ui-automation-provider.md): View an example of how to create a client-side UI Automation provider. The example implements a simple client-side provider for a console window.
- [Enable Navigation in a UI Automation Fragment Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/enable-navigation-in-a-ui-automation-fragment-provider.md): Read an example that shows how to enable navigation in a UI Automation provider for an element that's within a fragment.
- [Expose a Server-side UI Automation Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/expose-a-server-side-ui-automation-provider.md): View an example that shows how to expose a server-side UI Automation provider that's hosted in a System.Windows.Forms.Control window.
- [Expose the Content of a Table Using UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/expose-the-content-of-a-table-using-ui-automation.md): See how to expose the content of a table using UI Automation. The content and intrinsic properties of each cell within a tabular control are exposed.
- [Find a UI Automation Element Based on a Property Condition](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/find-a-ui-automation-element-based-on-a-property-condition.md): Find a UI Automation element based on a property condition. Locate an element within the UI Automation tree based on a specific property or properties.
- [Find a UI Automation Element for a List Item](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/find-a-ui-automation-element-for-a-list-item.md): See an example that shows how to find a UI Automation element for a list item when the index of the item is known.
- [Find and Highlight Text Using UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/find-and-highlight-text-using-ui-automation.md): Find and highlight text using UI Automation. An example sequentially searches for and highlights each occurrence of a string within the text control content.
- [Get Supported UI Automation Control Patterns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/get-supported-ui-automation-control-patterns.md): Read an example that shows how to retrieve supported control pattern objects from UI Automation elements.
- [Get the Toggle State of a Check Box Using UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/get-the-toggle-state-of-a-check-box-using-ui-automation.md): See a code example that shows how to get the toggle state of a control (such as a check box) using Microsoft UI Automation.
- [Get UI Automation Element Properties](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/get-ui-automation-element-properties.md): See instructions and an example that shows how to retrieve current or cached properties of a UI Automation element.
- [Implement UI Automation Providers in a Client Application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implement-ui-automation-providers-in-a-client-application.md): See an example of how to implement a client-side UI Automation provider in an application. Note that this is an uncommon scenario.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Dock Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-dock-control-pattern.md): Learn to implement the UI Automation dock control pattern. Use the DockPattern control pattern to expose a control's dock properties. Implement IDockProvider.
- [Implementing the UI Automation ExpandCollapse Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-expandcollapse-control-pattern.md): Learn implementation guidelines and conventions for the ExpandCollapse control pattern in UI Automation. Know how to implement IExpandCollapseProvider.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Grid Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-grid-control-pattern.md): Understand guidelines and conventions for implementing the GridPattern grid control pattern in UI Automation. Learn to implement the IGridProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation GridItem Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-griditem-control-pattern.md): Know guidelines and conventions to implement the GridItemPattern control pattern for grid items in UI Automation. See required members for IGridItemProvider.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Invoke Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-invoke-control-pattern.md): Read guidelines and conventions to implement the Invoke control pattern in UI Automation. See required members for the IInvokeProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation MultipleView Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-multipleview-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions to implement the MultipleView control pattern in UI Automation. See required members for the IMultipleViewProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation RangeValue Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-rangevalue-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions for implementing the RangeValue control pattern in UI Automation. See required members for the IRangeValueProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Scroll Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-scroll-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions for implementing the Scroll control pattern in UI Automation. See required members for the IScrollProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation ScrollItem Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-scrollitem-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions for implementing the ScrollItem control pattern in UI Automation. See required members for the IScrollItemProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Selection Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-selection-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions for implementing the Selection control pattern in UI Automation. See required members for the ISelectionProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation SelectionItem Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-selectionitem-control-pattern.md): See guidelines and conventions to implement the SelectionItem control pattern in UI Automation. Know required members for the ISelectionItemProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Table Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-table-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions to implement the Table control pattern in UI Automation. Know required members for the ITableProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation TableItem Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-tableitem-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions to implement the TableItem control pattern in UI Automation. Know required members for the ITableItemProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Toggle Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-toggle-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions to implement the Toggle control pattern in UI Automation. Know required members for the IToggleProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Transform Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-transform-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions to implement the Transform control pattern in UI Automation. Know required members for the ITransformProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Value Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-value-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions to implement the Value control pattern in UI Automation. Know required members for the IValueProvider interface.
- [Implementing the UI Automation Window Control Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/implementing-the-ui-automation-window-control-pattern.md): Review guidelines and conventions to implement the Window control pattern in UI Automation. Know required members for the IWindowProvider interface.
- [Microsoft UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/index.md): See articles about Microsoft UI Automation, an accessibility framework for Microsoft Windows. This documentation describes UI Automation API for managed code.
- [Invoke a Control Using UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/invoke-a-control-using-ui-automation.md): Use UI Automation to find a control matching certain property conditions, create an AutomationElement, get an InvokePattern, and use Invoke on the control.
- [Move a UI Automation Element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/move-a-ui-automation-element.md): See example code that shows how to move a UI Automation element to a specified screen location. It uses the WindowPattern and TransformPattern control patterns.
- [Navigate Among UI Automation Elements with TreeWalker](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/navigate-among-ui-automation-elements-with-treewalker.md): See a code example that shows how to navigate among UI Automation elements by using the TreeWalker class.
- [Obtain Mixed Text Attribute Details Using UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/obtain-mixed-text-attribute-details-using-ui-automation.md): Obtain mixed text attribute details using the managed UI Automation classes in the System.Windows.Automation namespace of the .NET API.
- [Obtain Text Attributes Using UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/obtain-text-attributes-using-ui-automation.md): Learn how to obtain text attributes using UI Automation. See a code example that gets text attributes from a text range.
- [Obtaining UI Automation Elements](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/obtaining-ui-automation-elements.md): Review various ways to obtain UI Automation element (AutomationElement) objects for user interface (UI) elements.
- [Raise Events from a UI Automation Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/raise-events-from-a-ui-automation-provider.md): See an example that shows how to raise an event from a UI Automation provider. It raises a UI Automation event in the implementation of a custom button control.
- [Register a Client-Side Provider Assembly](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/register-a-client-side-provider-assembly.md): Review an example that shows how to register a DLL that contains client-side UI Automation providers.
- [Return Properties from a UI Automation Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/return-properties-from-a-ui-automation-provider.md): See how a UI Automation provider can return properties of an element to client applications in .NET.
- [Server-Side UI Automation Provider Implementation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/server-side-ui-automation-provider-implementation.md): Understand how to implement a server-side UI Automation provider for a custom control in .NET. Implementation for WPF and non-WPF elements is different.
- [Subscribe to UI Automation Events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/subscribe-to-ui-automation-events.md): See how to subscribe to events raised by UI Automation providers. The example code registers an event handler for the event raised when a control is invoked.
- [Support Control Patterns in a UI Automation Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/support-control-patterns-in-a-ui-automation-provider.md): Understand how to implement support control patterns on a UI Automation provider so that client applications can manipulate controls and get data from them.
- [TextPattern and Embedded Objects Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/textpattern-and-embedded-objects-overview.md): Read an overview of how UI Automation exposes embedded objects, or child elements, within a text document or container using TextPattern and TextPatternRange.
- [Traverse Text Using UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/traverse-text-using-ui-automation.md): See an example of how to traverse the text content of a document using Microsoft UI Automation, in TextUnit increments.
- [UI Automation and Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-and-microsoft-active-accessibility.md): Understand the differences between UI Automation and Microsoft Active Accessibility, the previous solution for making applications accessible.
- [UI Automation and Screen Scaling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-and-screen-scaling.md): Read how Windows and UI Automation handle screen scaling. DWM does default scaling for all applications, which UI Automation client apps must take into account.
- [UI Automation Clients for Managed Code How-to Topics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-clients-for-managed-code-how-to-topics.md): See links to managed code how-to topics, which provide detailed information about implementing features of Microsoft UI Automation in a client application.
- [UI Automation Clients for Managed Code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-clients-for-managed-code.md): See links to overviews and how-to topics that help you develop UI Automation clients with managed code.
- [UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-patterns-for-clients.md): Read an overview about control patterns for UI Automation clients. Use control patterns to access information about the user interface (UI).
- [UI Automation Control Patterns How-to Topics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-patterns-how-to-topics.md): See links to how-to topics that contain detailed information about implementing control patterns with UI Automation.
- [UI Automation Control Patterns Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-patterns-overview.md): See an overview of UI Automation control patterns. Control patterns let you categorize and expose a control's functionality regardless of type or appearance.
- [UI Automation Control Patterns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-patterns.md): See links to articles that provide detailed information about how to implement various control patterns in Microsoft UI Automation.
- [UI Automation Control Types Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types-overview.md): Read an overview of UI Automation control types, which are well-known identifiers that can be used to indicate what kind of control an element represents.
- [UI Automation Control Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types.md): See the UI Automation control types that are available if you want to use the managed classes in the System.Windows.Automation namespace of the .NET API.
- [UI Automation Events for Clients](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-events-for-clients.md): Read about how Microsoft UI Automation events are used by UI Automation clients in .NET. UI Automation allows clients to subscribe to events of interest.
- [UI Automation Events Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-events-overview.md): See an overview of Microsoft UI Automation event notification. Review the types of events, UI Automation event identifiers, and UI Automation event arguments.
- [UI Automation Fundamentals](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-fundamentals.md): Get links to overviews of the Microsoft UI Automation API. Covered topics include trees, control patterns, properties, events, security, and automated testing.
- [UI Automation Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md): Read an overview of Microsoft UI Automation, the accessibility framework for Windows operating systems that support Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
- [UI Automation Properties for Clients](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-properties-for-clients.md): Read an overview of UI Automation properties as they are exposed to UI Automation client applications.
- [UI Automation Properties Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-properties-overview.md): See a broad overview of Microsoft UI Automation properties. Learn about property identifiers, properties by category, localization, and properties and events.
- [UI Automation Providers for Managed Code How-to Topics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-providers-for-managed-code-how-to-topics.md): See links to managed code how-to topics, which demonstrate tasks in writing Microsoft UI Automation providers for user interface (UI) elements.
- [UI Automation Providers for Managed Code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-providers-for-managed-code.md): See links to overviews and how-to topics that describe how to write Microsoft UI Automation providers for custom user interface (UI) elements in .NET.
- [UI Automation Providers Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-providers-overview.md): See an overview of UI Automation providers, which let controls communicate with UI Automation client applications. Review provider types and provider concepts.
- [UI Automation Security Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-security-overview.md): Read an overview of the security model for Microsoft UI Automation. Understand user account control, tasks that require higher privileges, and manifest files.
- [UI Automation Support for Standard Controls](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-standard-controls.md): Get information about UI Automation support for standard controls in applications developed for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), Win32, and Windows Forms.
- [UI Automation Support for the Button Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-button-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the Button control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the Calendar Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-calendar-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the Calendar control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the CheckBox Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-checkbox-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the CheckBox control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, and control patterns.
- [UI Automation Support for the ComboBox Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-combobox-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the ComboBox control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the DataGrid Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-datagrid-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the DataGrid control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the DataItem Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-dataitem-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the DataItem control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the Document Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-document-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the Document control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the Edit Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-edit-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the Edit control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the Group Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-group-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the Group control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the Header Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-header-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the Header control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the HeaderItem Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-headeritem-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the HeaderItem control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the Hyperlink Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-hyperlink-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the Hyperlink control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the Image Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-image-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the Image control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the List Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-list-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the List control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the ListItem Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-listitem-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the ListItem control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the Menu Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-menu-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the Menu control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the MenuBar Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-menubar-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the MenuBar control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.
- [UI Automation Support for the MenuItem Control Type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-support-for-the-menuitem-control-type.md): Get information about UI Automation support for the MenuItem control type. Learn the required tree structure, properties, control patterns, and events.

- [UI Automation Text Pattern-How-to Topics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-text-pattern-how-to-topics.md): See links to how-to topics that explain how to use the UI Automation text pattern. The topics include adding content to a text box, traversing text, and more.
- [UI Automation Text Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-text-pattern.md): See links to overviews and how-to topics about TextPattern. These links help you get started in programming for text elements in Microsoft UI Automation.
- [UI Automation TextPattern Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-textpattern-overview.md): Read an overview of the TextPattern control pattern in UI Automation. This control pattern exposes the textual content of a control, including format and style.
- [UI Automation Threading Issues](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-threading-issues.md): Read about issues with UI Automation threading. For example, conflicts may occur if a client application tries to interact with its own UI on the UI thread.
- [UI Automation Tree Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-tree-overview.md): Read an overview about UI Automation trees. Learn about different views of a UI Automation tree, such as raw view, control view, and content view.
- [Use Caching in UI Automation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/use-caching-in-ui-automation.md): See how to use caching in UI Automation. Review steps for activating a cache request, caching AutomationElement properties, and getting cached patterns.
- [Use the AutomationID Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/use-the-automationid-property.md): Review scenarios and sample code that shows how and when to use the AutomationID property to find an element within the UI Automation tree.
- [Using UI Automation for Automated Testing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/ui-automation/using-ui-automation-for-automated-testing.md): Read an overview that describes how to use UI Automation as a framework for programmatic access in automated testing scenarios.
